intro.paragraph1: Tax systems vary significantly around the world, reflecting different cultural, economic, and political priorities. Understanding how taxes work in different countries is essential for expatriates, international workers, and anyone interested in global financial planning.
intro.paragraph2: This guide explores major tax systems, comparing income tax rates, social contributions, deductions, and unique features of tax systems in different countries.
